title: Graduation Project
description: A ReactJS application about the study direction 'Computer programming' of the Artevelde University of Applied Sciences.

title: Just do IT!
description: The application should be installed according to how it is specified in the GitHub readme. To-do application with the possibility to Add tasks to a category and mark it as done. It's also possible to change the name of a task or category, and delete it. All data is stored in a relational database using TypeORM. Using the application is done by creating an account and logging in.

title: GitHub clone
description: This application is fetching data mainly from the GitHub API. It also fetches data from the city of Ghent, weather API and YouTube. Possibility to search GitHub users, play YouTube videos, search the weather in any city around the world.

title: Arne Quinze
description: Static website made for the Belgian artist "Arne Quinze". On the page "Art & Exhibitions" there is a search ability that filters on year, or category. The design was given by the client, the goal was to resemble the official website as close as possible.

title: Portfolio website
description: The website was created for the course IT Business to start applying for an internship and full-time workplace from february 2023. The code can be viewed on GitHub.
